title: "Found no NVIDIA driver on your system."
body_html: I'm trying to set up pyTorch on Ubuntu 16.04. I installed pyTorch with the "get started" instructions for Linux, pip, Python 2.7, CUDA 8.0. I updated my NVIDIA drivers to version 384.98, but I'm still getting this error. I also tried to install CUDA separately, but that didn't help either. How can I get pyTorch running on this system?
body_text: I'm trying to set up pyTorch on Ubuntu 16.04. I installed pyTorch with the "get started" instructions for Linux, pip, Python 2.7, CUDA 8.0.
